resources.name: List
resources.description:

Retrieves a collection of all purchase. Use the API call query parameters  to limit the results to a specific between data, purchase code, order, sort, pagination.

Query parameters

query_search

String

Search data by purchase code or users

start_date

Date

Filter purchase base on between date

end_date

Date

Filter purchase base on between date

order

String

List purchase order by field and sort

sort

String

List purchase sort “ASC” or “DESC”

per_page

Integer

Limit of purchase list

resources.name: Total option sales of index list
List
resources.description:
GET /api/ customer/list

Retrieves a collection of all sales. Use the API call query parameters  to limit the results to a specific between data, customer, users, order, sort, pagination, customer name.

Query parameters

users

string

search sales by user

start_date

date

filter sales base on sales date

end_date

date

filter sales base on sales date

per_page

Integer

Limit of sales list
